summary:
Iron Maiden is an English heavy metal band formed in 1975 by Steve Harris. The most well-known lineup includes Harris, Bruce Dickinson (lead vocals), Nicko McBrain (drums), and guitarists Dave Murray, Adrian Smith, and Janick Gers. They are considered pioneers of British heavy metal.

Their album "The Number of the Beast" (1982) is one of the best-selling heavy metal albums ever. After some ups and downs, the band gained new popularity when Dickinson and Smith returned in 1999. Iron Maiden has sold over 130 million albums worldwide and is known for their epic lyrics and iconic mascot, Eddie.
title: Iron Maiden
